metadata.Plot: The reporter Jimmie Brand at the "Daily Wire" solves the case of the Vibeleje murder. However, this put Brand in a terrible stressed condition and for this reason his boss decides to give him two weeks of vacation. But it will be a restless sabbatical because Brand will witness a strange crime in broad daylight in the Hill Park as he is looking through the window of his home. Brand decides to solve such a mysterious crime.
metadata.Actors: Olga Belajeff, Aage Bendixen, Frederik Jacobsen
